item.title: SQL Saragable Queries and Their Impact on Database Performance
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Structured Query Language (SQL) is widely used for managing data in relational database management systems (RDBMS). In the context of SQL, the optimization of database queries forms the foundation for efficient data retrieval, providing quicker response times and increasing overall database performance.
